hilelerle ilgili bir d√ºzenleme yapƒ±lmƒ±yor, biz bo≈üuna 2500-5000 saat oynuyoruz, bo≈üuna overwach bakƒ±yoruz, hi√ß bi≈üey olmuyor, cs go artƒ±k caƒüdƒ±≈üƒ± bir oyun, hi√ßbir hileyi durduramaz, sadece overwach i√ßin birde √ºst√ºne √ºstl√ºk o kadar para veriyorsunuz kar≈üƒ±nƒ±za gelen ki≈üi se√ßkin deƒüil hile yok almayƒ±n paranƒ±za yazƒ±k.......

It's like heroin or something. It starts out really fun and addicting, until it's not fun anymore and you just want to get your next fix. It ruins your life and on top of that you have an extraordinary toxic community, consisting of people who are definitely too young to play the game, griefers, racists, nazis, disgusting sexists and worse (Reporting them is useless btw).

With a community like that, which really likes to troll and grief you, even if you play your best and communicate, it's also basically impossible to get out of silver in matchmaking. You need friends which I don't have because, wise as they are, they wouldn't play CS:GO voluntarily.

Avoid the game if you want to have a good life.
